ai-iti93:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti93:2.3_0: The fires of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-iti93:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti93:3.1_0: “The fire of greed burns a mortal,
ai-iti93:3.3_0: while, fallen in the fire of hate,
ai-iti93:4.1_0: and, bewildered by the fire of delusion,
ai-iti93:4.2_0: they miss the teaching of the noble ones.
ai-iti93:4.4_0: people are caught up in identity.
ai-iti93:5.1_0: They fill the ranks of hell,
ai-iti93:6.1_0: But as to those committed day and night
ai-iti93:6.2_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-iti93:6.3_0: they quench the fire of greed,
ai-iti93:9.1_0: Seers of the noble truths, knowledge-masters,
ai-iti93:9.4_0: they come not back to future lives.”
ai-iti93:10.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
